mapper.sql: id,client ,type, parent_id, name, icon, path, url, sort
mapper.select: SELECT sm.id, sm.parent_id pid, sm.name, sm.name value, sm.icon, sm.path, sm.url,sm.sort FROM mx_security_menu sm LEFT JOIN mx_security_menu_role smr ON sm.id = smr.menu_id LEFT JOIN mx_security_user_role sur ON sur.role_id = smr.role_id WHERE sur.user_id = #{userId} AND sm.type = 0 AND sm.client = #{client} ORDER BY sm.sort
